text: DynamicalSystems.jl, DifferentialEquations.jl, Agents.jl, all export `step!` as well, and it also happens to be quite central to those packages. Can I possibly convince the Makie devs to not export `step!`? :stuck_out_tongue:

elements.text: as well, and it also happens to be quite central to those packages. Can I possibly convince the Makie devs to not export

text: I think it's not important at all, it belongs to Stepper which I think nobody uses outside of some MakieGallery examples

text: Then if you could not export it in the next release of AbstractPlotting, that would be really cool!
